channel.title: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?
channel.description: Well, i've been looking up for the past hour, can't exactly understand enough to know what It is, i'm trying to get all of the terms and vocab down before I try to learn to develop anything. I also apologize if their are guides already on this, if so please direct me to them. Thanks :)

item.source: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?

item.title: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

A Boolean is a primitive data type that can only hold two values, true and false. [size=5pt]Iirc, when compiled down its just a 0 and 1[/size]

If you’re looking at beginning to program, feel free to start reading here:

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

Then go install a base that tickles your fancy. Not turning this into a “what base is better” debate, while Hyperion is an amazing base that can teach you a lot, it also requires you to be quite familiar with OOP to be able to use it. Just go download one, and start writing commands, then expand outward. Write your own programs outside of RSPS, try making games, just do whatever you please. Only limits in programming are your knowledge of the language, and the boundaries that your computer provides.

Read full topic

item.title: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“hi im bamf, post:14, topic:456638”]I’m not exactly into web developing, but I’d love to develop games, and seeing as how this would be a excellent place to start I figured why not, It’d be an incredible career to pursue in my opinion.

Edit: Yeah I’ve played RuneScape incase anyone’s going to ask If i’m only hear cause I heard you all script

Another edit: what would be a good base to start\begin with?[/quote]

Well first of all make sure you learn all the basics, maybe get a e-book like Head First Java and then try
to make some sample apps or games then move on to another book that’s abit more advanced like
a book on 2D java game programming. You can even get start working on a source as you learn
java so you can add as you learn etc. i advise you to just go to the main board, Hit the Server
Downloads button and have a look and pick whatever suites your liking, then you can go and look
and the tutorial list for whatever base you used and try adding some stuff and then maybe
later modifying it and putting your own touch.

item.title: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?
item.dc:creator: @hi_im_bamf hi im bamf
item.description:
@hi_im_bamf wrote:

So let me get this straight, a Boolean is basically something that declares another thing to be either true or false, for example if you were to make it so that your overload stats don’t stay the same when entering the wilderness, it would be declared false? Sorry if i’m completely off.

edit:
void specialAttack() {
specialAttackNext = true;
}

void attack() {
if(specialAttackNext == true) {
specialAttackNext = false;
enemy.appendHit(200);
}
}

this cleared it up quite a bit, thank you ranger squad, the elve age, you’ve cleared so much up I’d rep honestly if I could.

Read full topic
item.source: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?

item.title: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

A slightly clearer example:

[code=java]void specialAttack() {
specialAttackNext = true;
}

void attack() {
if(specialAttackNext == true) {
specialAttackNext = false;
enemy.appendHit(200);
}
}[/code]

When the specialAttack method is called, specialAttackNext is set to true. Then, when the player attacks (the attack method), if specialAttackNext is true, set it to false and deal 200 damage to the enemy.

Read full topic
item.source: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?

item.source: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?

item.title: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

A boolean is a data type that can either be true or false.

[code=java]class Yo {
private boolean thisIsTrue;
private boolean thisIsFalse;

public static void main(String[] args) {
thisIsTrue = true;
thisIsFalse = false;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Could someone explain exactly what a Boolean is?
